title: EFL best goals: Five strikes not to miss
shortDescription: Take a look at some of the best finishes from Saturday's action in the Sky Bet EFL.

title: Aberdeen sack manager Glass | Johnston leaves Queen of the South
shortDescription: Aberdeen have sacked manager Stephen Glass following their exit from the Scottish Cup at the hands of Motherwell.

title: Rodgers on Leicester home truths and bouncing back
shortDescription: Brendan Rodgers has admitted "sometimes you have to be harsh to be clear" as the Leicester boss looks to reignite his team's season against West Ham.

title: Papers: Real want to bring Reguilon back from Spurs
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Sunday's national newspapers...

title: Klopp highlights value of experience amid Salah contract impasse
shortDescription: Jurgen Klopp says clubs can still reap the benefits of retaining players into their mid-30s - which could offer hope of a resolution to Mohamed Salah's contract impasse.

title: Tuchel: Time was running out for me | Mount injury fear
shortDescription: Thomas Tuchel has revealed he only beat his Covid isolation at the "second-to-last chance" to coach Chelsea to their maiden Club World Cup title in person.

title: Premier League relegation picture: Who is going down?
shortDescription: The battle for Premier League survival continues - but which of the contenders are best placed to avoid the drop?

title: 'Fernandinho is the best DM in PL history'
shortDescription: Jamie Redknapp analysed Fernandinho's performance against Norwich and hailed him as the best defensive midfielder in Premier League history.

title: PL hits & misses: Man Utd lack belief & ideas | Sterling on the rise
shortDescription: Manchester United are lacking in belief and ideas after conceding yet again after going ahead, but Man City's Raheem Sterling is on the rise.

title: Lampard lauds Van de Beek | 'That's why I moved quickly for him'
shortDescription: Everton boss Frank Lampard believes Donny van de Beek's impressive home debut showed why he "moved so quickly" to bring the midfielder to Goodison Park.

title: Pep praises Sterling but 'wants more' from Mahrez
shortDescription: Pep Guardiola "wants more" from Manchester City winger Riyad Mahrez, calling him "a little bit weak" in his work when competing for duels.

title: Chelsea win Club World Cup thanks to Havertz's extra-time penalty
shortDescription: Chelsea won the Club World Cup for the first time after Kai Havertz's extra-time penalty earned them a gritty 2-1 win over Brazilian side Palmeiras in Abu Dhabi.

title: Scottish Cup: Ramsey makes first start as Rangers beat Annan
shortDescription: Aaron Ramsey made his first Rangers start as they cruised into the Scottish Cup quarter-finals with a commanding 3-0 win over Annan Athletic at Galabank.

title: Sterling hits hat-trick as Man City stroll past Norwich
shortDescription: Manchester City stretched the gap back to 12 points at the top of the Premier League with a 4-0 victory over Norwich with Raheem Sterling scoring a perfect hat-trick.

title: Premier League previews: Newcastle vs Villa, Leicester vs West Ham
shortDescription: Team news, stats, predictions and how to follow the Premier League this Sunday, as Newcastle host Aston Villa and West Ham travel to Leicester, live on Sky Sports.

title: EFL highlights, round-up: Bournemouth win; Mitrovic equals record

title: Lampard's Everton thrash Leeds
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Everton's win over Leeds in the Premier League.

title: Coventry edge 10-man Reading in five-goal thriller
shortDescription: Relegation-threatened Reading marked their 150th club anniversary with another Sky Bet Championship defeat as they were beaten 3-2 by Coventry at the SCL Stadium.
